name: Pan Grilled Bangus
description: This Pan Grilled Bangus recipe is perfect for those looking to enjoy a healthy and delicious meal. The dish is high in protein, low in carbohydrates and sugar, and has a bold flavor profile thanks to the black pepper and garlic. It's an excellent choice for anyone following a healthy eating plan and looking for 'Healthified' recipes.
recipeIngredient: 3  tsp ground (2.3 g), Black Pepper - Ground

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the Boneless Milkfish (Bangus) by rinsing it under cold water and patting it dry with paper towels.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Season the Bangus with 3 tsp of ground black pepper and 1 tsp of minced garlic (Spice World). Ensure it's evenly coated on all sides.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your grill pan over medium heat. Once heated, place the seasoned Bangus on the grill.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Grill the Bangus for about 4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through and the skin is crisp.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the Bangus from the grill and let it rest for a couple of minutes before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
